original_text: The Lord hath opened his armoury, and hath brought forth the weapons of his indignation: for this is the work of the Lord God of hosts in the land of the Chaldeans.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그의 병기창을 열고 분노의 무기를 꺼냄은 주 만군의 여호와께서 갈대아 사람의 땅에 행할 일이 있음이라

sentences.original_text: The Lord hath opened his armoury,
and hath brought forth the weapons of his indignation:
for this is the work of the Lord God of hosts
in the land of the Chaldeans.
